com.contentful.java.cda

Class CDAClient.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.contentful.java.cda.CDAClient.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    CDAClient

    public static class CDAClient.Builder
extends Object
    Client builder. Calling the following methods is required before calling build():
    • setSpaceKey(String)
    • setAccessToken(String)

    • Method Detail

      • setAccessToken

        public CDAClient.Builder setAccessToken(String accessToken)
        Sets the access token to be used with this client.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - string representing the access token to be used when authenticating against the delivery api
        Returns:
        this Builder instance

      • setCallbackExecutor

        public CDAClient.Builder setCallbackExecutor(Executor executor)
        Sets the executor to use when invoking asynchronous callbacks.
        Parameters:
        executor - Executor on which any CDACallback methods will be invoked. This defaults to execute on the main thread for Android projects. For non-Android projects this defaults to the same thread of the HTTP client.
        Returns:
        this Builder instance

      • setCustomClasses

        public CDAClient.Builder setCustomClasses(Map<String,Class<?>> classMap)
        Register a mapping between Content Type identifiers and class types. Use this method in order to register custom CDAEntry subclasses to be instantiated by the client when Entries of the given Content Type are retrieved from the server. Note: In case custom fields are declared in the custom class those should either be Serializable or denoted by the transient modifier in order to skip serialization, otherwise whenever trying to use ResourceUtils.saveResourceToFile(com.contentful.java.cda.model.CDAResource, java.io.File) an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        classMap - mapping of Content Type identifiers to class types
        Returns:
        this Builder instance

      • setClient

        public CDAClient.Builder setClient(retrofit.client.Client client)
        Sets a custom client to be used for making HTTP requests.
        Parameters:
        client - Client instance
        Returns:
        this Builder instance

      • setClientProvider

        public CDAClient.Builder setClientProvider(retrofit.client.Client.Provider clientProvider)
        Sets a provider of clients to be used for making HTTP requests.
        Parameters:
        clientProvider - Client.Provider instance
        Returns:
        this Builder instance

        public CDAClient.Builder setEndpoint(String remoteUrl)

        this CDAClient.Builder instance

      • noSSL

        public CDAClient.Builder noSSL()
        Makes the client execute all requests via HTTP instead of HTTPS - use with caution.
        Returns:
        this Builder instance

      • preview

        public CDAClient.Builder preview()
        Sets this client to use the Preview API endpoint. Note: This is the same as invoking setEndPoint(Constants.ENDPOINT_PREVIEW)
        Returns:
        this Builder instance

      • nullifyUnresolvedLinks

        public CDAClient.Builder nullifyUnresolvedLinks()
        By default, unresolved links will point to a Map instance containing all the links details. This changes the default behaviour to remove any unresolved links.
        Returns:
        this Builder instance

      • build

        public CDAClient build()
        Builds and returns a CDAClient
        Returns:
        Client instance
